name: lpc-remote-editor
description: Enables creators on an LP MUD to remotely edit code through VS Code

configuration.title: LPC Remote Editor for LP MUDs

lpcRemoteEditor.uri.title: Host
lpcRemoteEditor.uri.description: The uri used to connect to the MUD

lpcRemoteEditor.userName.title: User Name
lpcRemoteEditor.userName.description: The MUD username to use for the connection

lpcRemoteEditor.password.title: Password
lpcRemoteEditor.password.description: The MUD password to use for the connection

lpcRemoteEditor.useOutputChannel.title: Use Debug Output Channel
lpcRemoteEditor.useOutputChannel.description: Creates a channel in the Output Window containing debugging information.

lpcRemoteEditor.addMyRealmFolderOnStartu.title: Add Realm folder on startup
lpcRemoteEditor.addMyRealmFolderOnStartu.description: In addition to the the existin base directory, a workspace folder, called My Realm, is automatically added and is mapped to your creator directory.

lpcRemoteEditor.myRealmTitle.title: Title of My Realm
lpcRemoteEditor.myRealmTitle.description: The name of the workspace folder that is added to represent the creator's realm.
